TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SendCompletedEventHandler(object sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SendCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SendCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AsyncCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void SendCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type SendCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AsyncCompletedEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: Stellt die Methode dar, durch die das -Ereignis behandelt wird.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Der Delegat wird verwendet, um Ereignisse zu behandeln, die auftreten, wenn die Klasse das asynchrone Senden einer e-Mail-Nachricht mithilfe der -Methode beendetThe delegate is used to handle events that occur when the class finishes asynchronously sending an email message using the method. ## Examples Im folgenden Codebeispiel wird das asynchrone Senden einer e-Mail-Nachricht veranschaulicht.The following code example demonstrates sending an email message asynchronously. Er verwendet eine , um die `SendCompletedCallback`-Methode aufzurufen, um Ereignisse zu behandeln.It uses a to invoke the `SendCompletedCallback` method to handle events. [!code-cpp[NclMailASync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/cpp/mailasync.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclMailASync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/CS/mailasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NclMailASync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/vb/mailasync.vb#1)]
